name: Adventures of Mothboi
description:
The year is 1966 and newspapers in West Virginia are all over Mothman, describing it as a "Man-Sized Bird ... Creature ... Something". In this game you control the cryptid and his companion on their journey, trying to avoid being photographed by journalists.

Developed for the Godot Wild Jam #29 with theme "Nomad"

Controls 

Move - W,A,S,D

Use Companion - Left click on target spot, it will distract the journalist there.
